channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiSOAR
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiSOAR

item.title: CVE-2022-29062|2024-10-22T20:54:27.903Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortisoar
item.description: Multiple relative path traversal vulnerabilities [CWE-23] in Fortinet FortiSOAR before 7.2.1 allows an authenticated attacker to write to the underlying filesystem with nginx permissions via crafted HTTP requests.

item.title: CVE-2022-42473|2024-10-22T20:52:17.735Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortisoar
item.description: A missing authentication for a critical function vulnerability in Fortinet FortiSOAR 6.4.0 - 6.4.4 and 7.0.0 - 7.0.3 and 7.2.0 allows an attacker to disclose information via logging into the database using a privileged account without a password.

item.title: CVE-2022-35847|2024-10-22T20:53:52.298Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortisoar
item.description: An improper neutralization of special elements used in a template engine vulnerability [CWE-1336] in FortiSOAR management interface 7.2.0, 7.0.0 through 7.0.3, 6.4.0 through 6.4.4 may allow a remote and authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary code via a crafted payload.
